title: Amir-Abdollahian confers with UN envoy for Iraq (Ministry of Foreign Affairs of IR of Iran) ...
text: ( Source : Ministry of Foreign Affairs of IR of Iran ) Deputy Foreign Minister for Arab-African Affairs, Hossein Amir-Abdollahian said on Saturday that Iran is strongly opposed to disintegration of Iraq . Amir Abdollahian made the remarks in a
